title: Curried BBQ mussels
ingredients: ['50g butter, softened', '2 cloves garlic, pressed', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '900g mussels, scrubbed and de-bearded', '150g chopped red pepper', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 lime, thinly sliced', '1 lime, cut into 4 wedges']
